mapper.insert: insert into diagnosis_medicine (mId, diaId, instruction, dosage, times,mAmount) values (#{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{diaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{instruction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{times,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mAmount})
mapper.select: select medicine.mName,medicine.mSpecification,medicine.mFee, dia_M_Id, medicine.mId, diaId, instruction, dosage, times,mAmount from diagnosis_medicine,medicine where diaId=#{diaId} and medicine.mId=diagnosis_medicine.mId
mapper.delete: delete from diagnosis_medicine where diaId=#{diaId} and mId=#{mId}
